entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
